channel.title: Runesky - Since 2009
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859364/Runesky-Banner.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859364/Runesky-Banner.png[/img][/url] [HR] [B][SIZE=5]Introcution[/SIZE][/B]
Runesky is a 317 server packed with a bunch of custom content. It's nothing like all the average servers out there. On Runesky you are being introduced to our custom home located in Port Phasmatys with shops and npc's placed all around the place. We have a friendly staff team, and there is always people there to help you if you need any kind of support.
This is not the type of server you have to spend hours on to learn. Everything from teleports, bosses, minigames & shops is easy avilable at home. You can also type in [i]::commands[/i] for a list of all our commands.
[U][b]Some more info:[/b][/U]
[b]SKILLS:[/b] Once again Runesky decided they were going to do a thing different from other severs, rather than having levuls going up to 99, we had them going up to 126 with a max xp of 250m and a max combat level of 160, but in wilderness it will change to max level going up to 110 and max combat level of 140 (this changes back once you leave the wildness).
[b]PVP:[/b] The main place on Runesky for player killing is Hill Giants. The main weapons is Dragon Claws%2S Dark bow, Night bow (custom), Seren Godsword (custom), Dragon Cross bow, Vesta long sword and also all regular godswords, along with "E" Godswords for donators.
When you have killed a player you will get 2 pk points which allows you to later spend the pk points on certain rewards from the Pk shop. There are also recorded stats for your kills, you will have the ability to wear the Player killing skill capes. 200 kills for Un-trimmed cape, 400 kills & .6 ratio for (t) cape, and 600 kills & .8 ratio for (m) cape.
[b]PVM:[/b] Runesky has a wide range of bosses for PvM, some of them are; Sea Troll Queen, Jad, Dagganoth Kings, Mithril Dragon, King Black Dragon, Kalphite Queen. But the best bosses are Bandos, Armadyl, Zammy, Saradomin and Corporeal Beast. These monsters drop the most valuable items on Runesky.
[b]DONATORS:[/b] You get a 15% increase on all experience you gain, ability to go to donatorzone, donator shop, spirit shields, ability to go to the corporeal beast and tormented demons, Vengance, Donator godswords, and much more!
[hr]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mb1Gmr8.png?1[/img]
[B][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE][/B]
[SPOILER=MEDIA] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859281/HOME.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859281/HOME.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859284/gwd.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859284/gwd.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859276/126.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859276/126.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859305/customs.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859305/customs.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859241/activec.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859241/activec.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859232/1.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859232/1.png[/img][/url] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4846297/SE.png[/img] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859242/banker.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859242/banker.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859234/2__2_.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859234/2__2_.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4856618/off.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4856618/off.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4856620/on.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4856620/on.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4856624/vengiocn.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4856624/vengiocn.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/4859239/3.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4859239/3.png[/img][/url][/SPOILER]
[B][SIZE=5]UPDATES[/SIZE][/B] [SPOILER=UPDATES][CODE]5/22/15 - Added christmas crackers - 100% working. 5/22/15 - Added new woodcutting base. 5/22/15 - changed max lvl to 126 and max combat lvl to 160.
6/1/15 - Added quest "Cook's Assistant". 6/1/15 - Added server uptime saving (visible in-game).
6/05/15 - Added new skill icons. 6/05/15 - Added party room ( few bugs).
5/10/15 - Added gnome pilot with interface & working teleports. 5/10/15 - Added modhelp command. 5/10/15 - Added clipped following. 5/10/15 - Fixed all doors. (opens and closes perfectly)
6/12/15 - 90% of home teleports working.
6/13/15 - Added sea troll queen & Scared Skavid with correct dialogues. 6/13/15 - Completed pretty much all home teleports. 6/13/15 - Added the tree's that used to be at home. 6/13/15 - Customized the client to look like the old one.
6/14/15 - Added items kept on death interface (showing items kept). 6/14/15 - Added fisherman at fishing spot. (shop missing). 6/14/15 - Added Nurmof at mining spot at home. (shop missing). 6/14/15 - Added farmer at hbank with teleport to farming patches.
6/17/15 - Fixed firemaking. The fire is now visible. 6/17/15 - Added a couple shops from old sky.
6/18/15 - Added a player online time save system. 6/18/15 - Added interface for all quests (ready to start writing them). 6/18/15 - Fixed fishing.
6/19/15 - Started Gertrudes Cat Quest.
6/20/15 - Gertrudes Cat is almost finished. (80-90%).
6/21/15 - Added pet system.
6/22/15 - Removed pet system due to bugs/glitches. 6/22/15 - Completed the quest Gertrudes Cat. 6/22/15 - Started the rest of the quests. 6/22/15 - Added a new NPC at home (quest related). 6/22/15 - Added kill & death count system. 6/22/15 - Switched back to old HP bars (from sky). 6/22/15 - Added timed ban. 6/22/15 - Added timed mute.
6/24/15 - Cleaned ObjectManager.java. 6/24/15 - Started Sea Troll Queen Dialogues, NPC's & Teleports.
6/25/15 - Started Firemaking. 6/25/15 - Improved fishing & fixed a bug that caused the player to keep fishing. 6/25/15 - Started Holiday Event 6/25/15 - Cleaned up spawn-config. 6/25/15 - Added Holiday Event Store at home. 6/25/15 - The River Trolls teleports you to Sea Troll Queen once killed. 6/25/15 - All shops at home are now finished. 6/25/15 - Customized the prayer icons to look like Runesky's old ones. (head-icons & tab)
6/26/15 - Started improving fishing and fixing all bugs/glitches. 6/26/15 - Added countdown for membership. (counting days you have membership until it ends)
7/04/15 - Re-added all of Runesky's magic tabs. 7/04/15 - You can now login with your enter button. 7/04/15 - Changed item amount colors to Runesky's old. 7/04/15 - Added a few commands (::male, ::female, ::char). 7/04/15 - Implemented & improved Armo's bank pin system. 7/04/15 - New dialogues (when clicking the bank/banker he asks if you want to set a new pin).
7/05/15 - New client menu's updated. (Credits to Pax)
7/06/15 - Pretty much re-wrote fishing yet again due to bugs. 7/06/15 - Added character backup system & file backup system. - (credits to Pax). 7/06/15 - Added auto donation membership system. - (credits to Pax). 7/06/15 - Forum account linked to in-game account. - (credits to Pax).
07/11/15 - Rune essence mining is now added.
07/12/15 - Added vengeance to ancient spellbook with requirements (donator & 110 magic). 07/12/15 - Fixed smithing interface.
07/13/15 - The client now opens on the middle of your screen. 07/13/15 - Pretty much finished the Summer Event. 07/13/15 - Fixed ancient spellbook teleports.
07/16/15 - Started working on Sea Troll Queen. 07/16/15 - Added server control panel. 07/16/15 - Added vote system. 07/16/15 - Started working on wild lvls (when in wild, cb resets to 110). 07/16/15 - Added a few custom items (Seren Godsword & Dragon C'bow). 07/16/15 - Started working on a system for the skillcape requirements.
07/17/15 - Finished the Summer Event. 07/17/15 - Started implementing Netty.
07/18/15 - Added Amulet of Health 07/18/15 - Made XP rates x40
07/19/15 - Patched a whole bunch of bugs & glitches.
07/20/15 - Improved fishing 07/20/15 - Firemaking is rewritten 07/20/15 - Cooking is rewritten
07/21/15 - All slayer npc's is now added. To get a new gem talk to Duradel. 07/21/15 - Added commands: ::brimhaven, ::taverly, ::island & ::clearinv 07/21/15 - Patched a whole bunch of bugs. 07/21/15 - [/CODE][/SPOILER]
[B][SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE][/B]
• Active Community • Great PK'ing • 21 Skills • Quests • Bosses • Daily updates • Great economy
[B][SIZE=5]JOIN US TODAY:[/SIZE][/B]
Website: [url=http://runeskyps.com/]RuneSky - The Sky's The Limit.[/url] Forums: [url=http://runeskyps.com/community/]RuneSky - Community[/url] Play now: [url=http://runeskyps.com/play/]RuneSky - Play[/url]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Runesky - Since 2009
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

[CENTER]
[HR]
[SIZE=5]Introcution[/SIZE]

Runesky is a 317 server packed with a bunch of custom content. It’s nothing like all the average servers out there.
On Runesky you are being introduced to our custom home located in Port Phasmatys with shops and npc’s placed all around the place.
We have a friendly staff team, and there is always people there to help you if you need any kind of support.

This is not the type of server you have to spend hours on to learn. Everything from teleports, bosses, minigames & shops is easy avilable at home.
You can also type in ::commands for a list of all our commands.

Some more info:

SKILLS:
Once again Runesky decided they were going to do a thing different from other severs,
rather than having levuls going up to 99, we had them going up to 126 with a max xp of 250m and a max combat level of 160,
but in wilderness it will change to max level going up to 110 and max combat level of 140 (this changes back once you leave the wildness).

PVP:
The main place on Runesky for player killing is Hill Giants. The main weapons is Dragon Claws%2S Dark bow, Night bow (custom), Seren Godsword (custom), Dragon Cross bow, Vesta long sword and also all regular godswords, along with “E” Godswords for donators.

When you have killed a player you will get 2 pk points which allows you to later spend the pk points on certain rewards from the Pk shop. There are also recorded stats for your kills, you will have the ability to wear the Player killing skill capes. 200 kills for Un-trimmed cape, 400 kills & .6 ratio for (t) cape, and 600 kills & .8 ratio for (m) cape.

PVM:
Runesky has a wide range of bosses for PvM, some of them are; Sea Troll Queen, Jad, Dagganoth Kings, Mithril Dragon, King Black Dragon, Kalphite Queen. But the best bosses are Bandos, Armadyl, Zammy, Saradomin and Corporeal Beast.
These monsters drop the most valuable items on Runesky.

DONATORS:
You get a 15% increase on all experience you gain, ability to go to donatorzone, donator shop, spirit shields, ability to go to the corporeal beast and tormented demons, Vengance, Donator godswords, and much more!

[hr]

Mb1Gmr8.png?1762×501

[/SPOILER]

7/04/15 - Re-added all of Runesky’s magic tabs.

07/21/15 - Patched a whole bunch of bugs.
